document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2017-08
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING A DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT TO EXTEND THE TIME PERIOD TO ACT ON THE NAPA LOGISTICS PARK PHASE 2 CONDITIONAL USE PERMIT BY TEN YEARS; FOR THE PROJECT LOCATED SOUTH OF THE NAPA COUNTY AIRPORT AND WEST OF THE NAPA BRANCH RAILROAD LINE, APN 057-090-083, (FILE NO. PL 17-0010)
